snippet: Maj. Gen. Margaret H. Woodward will encourage more airmen and women to not only report sexual assault but also pursue prosecution.
abstract: Maj Gen Margaret H Woodward has been named to run significantly expanded Air Force office in charge of its sexual assault prevention and response policies; says in interview that one of her main goals will be to encourage more airmen and women to not only report sexual assault but to pursue prosecution.
lead_paragraph: Maj. Gen. Margaret H. Woodward will encourage more airmen and women to not only report sexual assault but also pursue prosecution.

headline.main: Air Force General Takes Over Vastly Expanded Sexual Assault Office
headline.print_headline: Air Force General Takes Over Vastly Expanded Sexual Assault Office

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
